metadata.Title: CVE-2022-35205 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Binutils readelf 2.38.50, reachable assertion failure in function display_debug_names allows attackers to cause a denial of service.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> binutils isn't safe for untrusted inputs. ccdm94> display_debug_names was added with commit 613643582c4f, not included in the binutils code for xenial and earlier.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
